description: Try our easy to follow Apple Crumble recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Crumble,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Apple,Egg free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Apple Crumble Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Grease a 4-cup oven-proof dish and place on a baking tray.

Combine 2 tbs of the brown sugar with cornflour, cinnamon and sultanas in a bowl. Peel, core and thinly slice the apples and toss in flour mixture to coat. Layer into prepared dish and sprinkle over combined water (2 tbs) and lemon juice.

Mix flour and remaining sugar together in a bowl. Add butter and rub into flour with fingertips until crumbly. Mix in almonds. Scatter over apple, cover with foil and bake for 30 minutes. Remove foil and cook for 30 minutes more until golden. Serve with cream or ice cream.
